data.eml:eml: The importance of correct labelling of types: an example in Tortricidae (Lepidoptera) and its rectification

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aarvik, Leif, Prins, Willy De (2017): The importance of correct labelling of types: an example in Tortricidae (Lepidoptera) and its rectification. Zootaxa 4347 (3): 595-597, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.3.12
